name: Hot Artichoke Dip with Green Chiles
author: David
summary: Green chile peppers and garlic spice up this easy and delicious hot dip. It's great to serve while your guests are enjoying wine and waiting on the main course.  It goes very well with tortilla chips.
ingredients: ½ (16 ounce) jar creamy salad dressing
1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chile peppers
1 (14 ounce) can marinated artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a medium bowl, mix the creamy salad dressing, garlic, Parmesan cheese, green chile peppers and artichoke hearts
Transfer the mixture to a small baking dish
Bake uncovered in the preheated oven 30 minutes, or until bubbly and lightly brown
Garnish with green onions and tomato
